headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Albemarle (ALB) After A 90% One Year Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Albemarle's share price still offers value after a strong run, this article will walk you through what the numbers currently suggest about the stock. Albemarle's stock has recently closed at US$161.29, with returns of 12.1% over the last 7 days, 21.5% over the last 30 days, 12.1% year to date, 90.3% over 1 year, a 30.4% decline over 3 years, and a 5.0% decline over 5 years. This signals a mixed picture for investors thinking about entry or exit points. Recent...
